mapper.select: select * from `km_cs_faq` AS a JOIN `km_cs_cate1` AS b ON a.cate1 = b.cate1 JOIN `km_cs_cate2` AS c ON b.cate1 = c.cate1 AND a.cate2 = c.cate2 WHERE a.cate1 = c.cate1 AND a.cate2 = c.cate2;
select a.*, b.c1Name, c.c2Name from `km_cs_qna` as a join `km_cs_cate1` as b on a.cate1 = b.cate1 join `km_cs_cate2` as c on b.cate1 = c.cate1 and a.cate2 = c.cate2 where `no`=#{no};

select a.*, c.c2Name from `km_cs_qna` as a join `km_cs_cate1` as b on a.cate1 = b.cate1 join `km_cs_cate2` as c on b.cate1 = c.cate1 and a.cate2 = c.cate2 where b.cate1 = #{cate1} order by `no` desc limit #{start}, 10;
